item.title: Master
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:4, topic:385339”] int skilld = 0; int leveld = 99; c.playerXP[skilld] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(leveld); c.playerLevel[skilld] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skilld]);

That should work. You would have to add all of the skill id’s though.[/quote]

public void addSkillXP(int lvl, skillID) {
      c.playerXP[skillID] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(lvl);
      c.playerLevel[skillID] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skillID]);
}

That should work…Just change the XP to the level you want.

Read full topic
